channel.title: Kexion - Pk Server - Project - LOOKING FOR CODERS! REWARDS AVAILABLE
channel.description:
Greetings...!
After experimenting with many different sources, i just havent found one that fits my needs. So there for im planning on creating my own. I will need some help, so who ever wants to help will get admin status on my server, and i might even pay you cash via paypal.
This will be a pk base source.
Here are the features that i have in mind
- Doors/ Stairs Work, Or atleast majority of them - Skill Capes - Ability to add objects like statues/portals anywhere i want. - Ability to transform into a npc - Ability to view kills, deaths, when you type ::stats - highscores board in the center of varrock that shows the top people with the most kills - Everywhere wild except for varrock - Make it so certain doors require certain keys ( so players can have there own houses ) - Make it so when a player right clicks another player it shows, ( Attack, Name, Level, trade, Follow ) - All monsters fight back and hit correctly - When admins/mods right click on a player it shows, ( Attack, Name, Level, Trade, Follow, Ban, kick) - Make it so all spells require runes - Make it so in order to change spell books you need to pray at an alter in varrock. - Ability to send someone to jail ( ::jail playername ) This will put them in a cage and tele block them for 1 hour - Ability to change password ( ::pass newpassword) - Make it so every time you cut trees you get cash instead of logs. - Ability to add portals that when clicked on will take you to a certain location. - Display wilderness sign when outside of varrock and display wilderness sign when in varrock. - Make it so you have to have a certain key inorder to open a chest to receive a reward. - Tele Block Spell that blocks a person from teleporting - make it so when a person disconnects from server while fighting, that they will die. - make it so you cant log out until 10 sec... after fighting - Ability to let alot of people play - Lag free
thats what i have in mind, so if your interested in helping, i would greatly appreciate it.
Please post feed back, comments etc...
Also i guess the first step to this project will be what source to start with, so does anyone know any that will be able to do all the things listed above?
thanks

item.title: Kexion - Pk Server - Project - LOOKING FOR CODERS! REWARDS AVAILABLE
item.dc:creator: @runevault runevault
item.description:
@runevault wrote:

Ok i think we got the basics done, we just need the pking system, so what is your guys msn, because we cant figure out some stuff, like displaying the wilderness sign out side of varrock[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 06, 2008, 11:30:22 AM[/size][hr]bump anyone want to help

Read full topic
